data.title: Touch/ReleaseNotes/OTA
data.text:
Image numbers

As each channel and device has separate versioning, the following list shows the respective image numbers corresponding to the released update:

BQ Aquaris E4.5 : ubuntu-touch/stable/bq-aquaris.en - krillin: #35

BQ Aquaris E5 : ubuntu-touch/stable/bq-aquaris.en - vegetahd: #15

Emulator : ubuntu-touch/stable/bq-aquaris.en - generic: #18

BQ Aquaris M10 : ubuntu-touch/stable/bq-aquaris-pd.en - frieza: #6

BQ Aquaris M10 HD : ubuntu-touch/stable/bq-aquaris-pd.en - cooler: #6

Emulator : ubuntu-touch/stable/bq-aquaris-pd.en - generic: #2

Nexus 4 : ubuntu-touch/stable/bq-aquaris.en - mako: #33

Meizu MX4 : ubuntu-touch/stable/meizu.en - arale: #15

Emulator : ubuntu-touch/stable/meizu.en - generic: #4

Meizu PRO 5: ubuntu-touch/stable/meizu-pd.en - turbo: #5

Emulator : ubuntu-touch/stable/meizu-pd.en - generic: #2

Meizu MX4 : ubuntu-touch/stable/meizu.zh - arale: #11

Emulator : ubuntu-touch/stable/meizu.zh - generic: #4

Meizu PRO 5: ubuntu-touch/stable/meizu-pd.zh - turbo: #5

Emulator : ubuntu-touch/stable/meizu-pd.zh - generic: #2

Nexus 4 : ubuntu-touch/stable/ubuntu - mako: #33

Nexus 7 : ubuntu-touch/stable/ubuntu - flo: #11

Emulator : ubuntu-touch/stable/ubuntu - generic: #21

Emulator (x86) : ubuntu-touch/stable/ubuntu - generic_x86: #21

On a device, this "image number" is shown as the "OS build number" in System Settings > About this phone > OS.

Overview of changes

This list is only a highlight of the few changes available in this update. Please check the detailed changes for all the changes included in this OTA.

Framework versions

This update provides a new framework version: 15.04.7

Important features

New power daemon implementation (repowerd), improved screen management and proximity detection logic

Initial implementation of storage framework

Legacy application copy-paste support

Out of the box experience changes, hardware keyboard selection added

New C++ UbuntuMetrics library that can be used for monitoring various metrics in QtQuick 2 applications

Support for multiple-calendar syncs

Emoji keyboard improvements

New reworked Updates panel in system settings

App updates show version changes for available updates and the set of recently installed updates

New reworked Notifications panel with individual per-app settings for sound, vibrate, message bubble

New keyboard system indicator

Added Latvian keyboard to ubuntu-keyboard

Oxide 1.16.8

Gstreamer 1.8.2

Bugfixes

Some fixes for bluetooth pairing in cars

Fix for connecting to WiFi access points with long passwords

Camera orientation fixes

Fixes for audio and video in sync on the M10

Fixes for other vibrations setting

Some application startup improvements

Final fix for accented characters now working in all applications

And many many more...!

Detailed changes

Commitlog: http://people.canonical.com/~lzemczak/landing-team/ota/ota-13.commitlog

Milestone: https://launchpad.net/canonical-devices-system-image/+milestone/13

Known issues

The following is a list of issues that notable enough for explicit mention in the release notes.
